name: Arm & Hammer Pet Scents Gel Odor Eliminator, Solid Baking Soda Deodorizer for Pet Areas, Homes, Litter Boxes, and Rooms, Long-Lasting Odor Control, Fresh Breeze Scent, 15 Oz
short_description: STRONG ODOR ELIMINATION: Designed to help absorb and neutralize everyday pet odors using a solid gel format combined with baking soda, making it suitable for common pet areas like litter boxes, crates, and living spaces where odors tend to linger.

EASY SET AND USE: Simple solid gel deodorizer requires no plugs, batteries, or sprays, allowing placement in pet rooms, bathrooms, or entryways to help manage odors with minimal effort and no daily maintenance.

BAKING SODA FORMULA: Formulated with Arm & Hammer baking soda, known for odor absorption, to help reduce unwanted smells from pets, food, or trash while supporting a fresher indoor environment over time.

PET FRIENDLY DESIGN: Solid gel air freshener is designed for use around pets when used as directed, providing odor control without aerosols, flames, or continuous sprays that may disrupt daily household routines.
LONG LASTING SCENT: Fresh Breeze scent is designed to release gradually as the gel shrinks, helping maintain consistent odor control in small to medium rooms without overwhelming fragrance intensity.
VERSATILE PLACEMENT: Suitable for use in litter box areas, pet sleeping spaces, closets, bathrooms, and other odor prone rooms, offering flexible placement options throughout the home.
LOW PROFILE CONTAINER: Compact 15 oz container fits discreetly on shelves or floors, helping manage pet related odors while blending into everyday home spaces without drawing attention.
product_description: Arm & Hammer Pet Scents Gel Odor Eliminator is designed to help manage everyday pet odors in homes using a solid gel deodorizer enhanced with baking soda. It offers a simple way to support a fresher indoor environment without sprays or plugs. The solid gel format allows gradual scent release as it naturally shrinks over time, helping reduce odors in areas like litter boxes, pet crates, bathrooms, and common living spaces. The Fresh Breeze scent is formulated to remain noticeable without becoming overpowering. This pet area deodorizer is easy to place and requires no setup or maintenance, making it suitable for routine household use. Its compact container allows discreet placement while supporting ongoing odor control where pets spend the most time.

name: Fresh Step Cat Litter Box Odor Eliminating Spray - Odor Neutralizing Cat Deodorizer Spray for Kitty Litter Box, 24 Fl Oz
short_description: CAT LITTER BOX SPRAY CONCEALS ODORS - Fresh Step Litter Box Odor Eliminating Spray targets cat waste odor to quickly and efficiently eliminate smells emanating from your kitty litter box

EASY-TO-USE SPRAY - Fresh Step's easy to use litter box scent spray makes litter box maintenance a breeze! Simply spray this pet-safe formula into the litter box before putting litter into the cat box to provide a second barrier to kitty's box odor
PET FRIENDLY FORMULA - Formulated to be safe for your cat stepping in and out of their litter box
PURR-FECTLY PAIRS WITH FRESH STEP LITTER - Pair this spray with your favorite Fresh Step litter for the ultimate dynamic duo to keep your home odor free
WILL NOT CAUSE CLUMPING IN LITTER - This litter box odor eliminator will not cause clumping among litter where it is sprayed
product_description: Fresh Step is a brand committed to making the world a more welcoming place for our feline friends and their owners. When a cat has found their rightful place in your home, Fresh Step is here to step in and ensure that your house still smells like you, and not your new four-legged companion. Keeping your cat's litter box and surrounding area clean is necessary for the health and wellness of the home. It's this rationale that drove the development of the Fresh Step litter box products. With clever design and innovation, keeping your litter area fresh just got easier! This product is perfect for cat odor removal. Just spray a light layer of the cat litter deodorizer on the bottom of the box before you add litter to provide an extra line of defense against kitty litter odor. You can also use the litter odor eliminator after scooping or whenever you notice that your litter could use a little boost. The litter box cleaner targets cat urine and feces odor to neutralize the smell around the cat box and throughout your home. Fresh Step cat litter deodorizing spray is pet-friendly and will not cause clumping. It comes in a 24 fluid-ounce spray bottle and comes scented to add a revitalizing, fresh scent to your litter box. If you're looking for a litter box odor eliminator that works, look no further than Fresh Step cat spray! With the Fresh Step cat box odor eliminator, your guests will feel welcome in your home, even around the litter box; having a cat has never been so clean! DIRECTIONS: Spray litter odor eliminator directly onto litter after scooping or anytime your litter needs a boost to control litter box odor. This versatile cat deodorizer for litter box works on all types of litter. Safety WARNINGS: Keep litter box spray out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes and skin. Wash hands immediately after use. In case of eye contact, flush thoroughly with water. If irritation persists, seek medical attention.

name: Fresh Step Litter Box Charcoal Odor Eliminator Powder, Cat Litter Deodorizer Additive to Help Absorb and Control Strong Litter Box Odors for Cleaner Smelling Homes, 15 Oz
short_description: CHARCOAL ODOR ABSORPTION: Activated charcoal works to trap and reduce strong litter box odors by absorbing odor-causing moisture, helping maintain a noticeably fresher litter area between full litter changes in active cat households.

ADDITIVE FOR EXISTING LITTER: Designed to be sprinkled directly into current cat litter, boosting odor control performance without requiring a litter switch or disrupting your cat’s established litter box routines.

EASY POST-SCOOP APPLICATION: Apply a light layer after scooping to help neutralize odors quickly, supporting consistent freshness as part of regular litter box cleaning and ongoing household maintenance routines.

COMPATIBLE WITH MOST LITTER TYPES: Safe for use with clumping, non-clumping, crystal, and natural litters, giving cat owners flexibility regardless of the litter material currently used in their home environment.

HELPS REDUCE LINGERING SMELLS: Targets odor sources at the litter surface by absorbing moisture that contributes to persistent smells developing between scheduled litter box changes over time and regular daily use.

LIGHTWEIGHT POWDER FORMAT: Fine powder spreads evenly across litter for uniform odor control coverage, allowing the charcoal to contact odor sources efficiently while remaining easy to store and handle between applications.

15 OZ CONTAINER INCLUDED: Includes a 15 ounce container of charcoal litter deodorizer powder designed for routine odor control in single- or multi-cat households where litter boxes are used daily and maintained regularly.
product_description: Fresh Step Litter Box Charcoal Odor Eliminator Powder is designed to help absorb and control strong litter box odors. This deodorizer works as an additive to existing litter for improved freshness between changes. Formulated with charcoal, the powder helps trap odor-causing moisture at the source. It can be sprinkled directly into the litter box after scooping to help maintain a cleaner-smelling environment. With a 15 oz container, this litter deodorizer is suitable for regular use in single- or multi-cat households. It works with most litter types and fits easily into routine litter box maintenance.

name: Clean Revolution Cat Litter Deodorizer Spray – 18oz, Probiotic Odor Elimination with DustLock™, Fragrance-Free, Extends Litter Life, Non-Toxic, Safe for All Cats, Made in USA
short_description: Probiotic Odor Elimination – Harnesses the power of good bacteria to break down urine and waste odors at the source for a fresher litter box that lasts longer.
Innovative DustLock Technology – Traps dust and allergens before they spread, reducing paw prints and supporting cleaner air in your home.
Extends Litter Life – By reducing odors and keeping litter fresher, you can scoop more and replace less—saving you time and money.

Powered by Probiotics & Zinc Salt – Natural odor-fighting duo: probiotics break down waste at the source, while plant-derived zinc salt traps and neutralizes ammonia odors without harsh chemicals or perfumes.
Safe & Non-Toxic – Fragrance-free, pH neutral, and made without harsh chemicals or artificial additives—gentle enough for kittens, tough enough for odors.
Works with All Litter Types – Clay, clumping, natural, crystal—our formula is designed for every cat household.
Made in the USA – Proudly crafted with eco-friendly, biodegradable ingredients and never tested on animals.
product_description: Say goodbye to overpowering perfumes and messy litter dust. Clean Revolution Cat Litter Deodorizer Spray uses advanced probiotic odor control and exclusive DustLock™ technology to keep your litter box fresher, cleaner, and healthier for both you and your cat. The secret? Nature’s own odor fighters. Probiotics – The “good bacteria” that safely break down organic waste, stopping smells before they spread. Zinc Ricinoleate – A plant-derived zinc salt that captures and binds odor molecules, especially ammonia, so the air stays fresh. Together, they deliver true, lasting freshness—no cover-ups, no mystery chemicals. The addition of DustLock™ means less airborne dust and fewer paw prints tracked through your home. Just spray directly onto your cat litter daily for immediate and long-lasting results. With non-toxic, eco-friendly ingredients and a fragrance-free formula, this deodorizer is safe for all cats, kittens, and multi-cat households. Plus, it’s made in the USA with a commitment to sustainability. Because a happy cat means a happy home—and it all starts with a cleaner litter box.
